name: plura Financial
tag_list: small-business-loans, sba, sba-loan, sba-loans, funding, business-loan, loan-rates, smb
overview:
Plura Financial Solutions (www.plurafinancial.com) is an online business-loan matchmaker, connecting small business seeking competitive financing with a network of the best banks for small business loans. Kinda like match.com, but for businesses & banks seeking relationships!

Plura’s automated platform sends each borrower’s commercial loan application (the Electronic Loan Application or “ELA”) to a targeted list of lenders. The lender(s) submit non-binding proposals, and the borrower selects the lender & term sheet they like best!

plura Financial’s goal is to find small businesses the best possible financing terms available, and the process is 100% free for borrowers.
